description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[History of the War in France and Belgium, 1815; containing minute details of the battles of Quatre-Bras, Ligny, Wavre, and Waterloo.]" Author: SIBORNE, William. With remarks upon the Rev. G. R. Gleig's “Story of Waterloo.'. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003376543 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life.
